chemistryFields.name: Inorganic Chemistry
chemistryFields.description: The study of inorganic compounds and materials, including metals, minerals, and organometallic compounds.

chemistryFields.name: Organic Chemistry
chemistryFields.description: The study of carbon-containing compounds and their reactions.

chemistryFields.name: Physical Chemistry
chemistryFields.description: The study of the physical properties and behaviors of chemical systems.

chemistryFields.name: BioChemistry
chemistryFields.description: The study of the chemical processes and substances that occur within living organisms.

chemistryFields.name: Analytical Chemistry
chemistryFields.description: The study of the chemical processes and substances that occur within living organisms.
